title: (x) Helen of Troy/Deathlands - (similar to) Rusticana, Albertus/customized {Patricia, James}
content:
I've got to recreate these TTs in various languages.   
Any help on identifying the fonts used will be most appreciated...   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516143621im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/36990.gif)   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516143621im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/36991.gif)
author: trajkov

comments.content:
Similar but not exactly Rusticana (Helen of Troy)   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/rusticana/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516143621/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/rusticana/)
Desire is war looks like [Albertus](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516143621/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/albertus/mt/testdrive.html?s=DESIRE%2BIS%2BWAR&p=48) that's been modified slightly.

Many thanks!!!   
   
...I ended up customising a squished version of   
Helvetica Neue Heavy Condensed for the Deathlands TT...
